At Smartscore Global, accessible from ht: At SMARTSCORE Global, accessible from http://www.smartscore.global, one of our main prioirities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recored by SMARTSCORE Global and how we use it.
If you have additional questions or requ: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us.
This Privacy Policy covers how Smartscor: This Privacy Policy covers how SMARTSCORE and SMARTSCORE Global (collectively, "Smartscore") handles personal data whichever channel you use, such as our websites, thorough the mobile app, or in person (including by phone call, conference calls, at our offices.) SMARTSCORE may also link to third party on our services. SMARTSCORE's Privacy Policy does not apply how third parties define personal data or how they intend to use it. We encourage you to read their privacy policies and know your pricacy rights before interacting with them.
By using our website, you hereby consent: By using our website, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms.
Personal Data Smartscore collects from y: Personal Data Smartscore collects from you
At Smartscore, we view privacy as a prio: At Smartscore, we view privacy as a priority. This means we aim to collect only the personal data that we need.
When you download our mobile app, regist: When you download our mobile app, register for an account, download the brochure, request a demo of our solution, connect to our services, contact us (by email, phone call, social media etc.), participate in a survey, or otherwise interact with Smartscore, we may collect a variety of information, including:
Account information (Account ID, related: Account information (Account ID, related account details, email address, account status, age, contacts)
Contact information (Name, email address: Contact information (Name, email address, physical address, phone number, other contact information)
Device Information (Data from which your: Device Information (Data from which your device can be identified, device serial number, browser type, device language)
Location Information (Data on where our: Location Information (Data on where our mobile app, website was activated and activities were performed on our services)
Usage Data (Data about your activity on: Usage Data (Data about your activity on and use of our mobile app, online website, including usage time, menus used)
Other Information You Provide to Us (Det: Other Information You Provide to Us (Details on your communications with Smartscore, including interactions with customer support, contacts through email, physical mail, social media etc.)
We use the information we collect in var: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
• Provide, operate, and maintain our web: • Provide, operate, and maintain our website, mobile app, and solution
• Improve, personalize, and expand our w: • Improve, personalize, and expand our website, mobile app, and solution
• Understand and analyze how you use our: • Understand and analyze how you use our website, mobile app, and solution
• Develop new products, services, featur: • Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
• Communicate with you, either directly: • Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes
• Send you emails, updates on our servic: • Send you emails, updates on our services
• Personalization purposes when you are: • Personalization purposes when you are in need of customized services or communications.
• Comply with Law (in order to comply w: • Comply with Law  (in order to comply with applicable law, for example,  to satisfy tax or reporting)
Smartscore Global follows a standard pro: SMARTSCORE Global follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they visit websites and the mobile app. All hosting companies do this and a part of hosting services’ analytics. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the site, tracking users’ movement on the website, and gathering demographic information.
Smartscore may share personal data with: SMARTSCORE may share personal data with SMARTSCORE-affiliated companies, service providers who act on our behalf, our partners, developers. SMARTSCORE does not share personal data with third parties for their own marketing purposes.
You may consult this list to find the Pr: You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of SMARTSCORE Global.
Third-party ad servers or ad networks us: Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Web Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on SMARTSCORE Global, which are sent directly to users’ browser.
They automatically receive your IP addre: They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on websites that you visit. Note that SMARTSCORE Global has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers
You can choose to disable cookies throug: You can choose to disable cookies through your individual browser options. To know more detailed information about cookie management with specific web browsers, it can be found at the browsers’ respective websites.
We would like to make sure you are fully: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
The right to access - You have the right: The right to access - You have the right to request copies of your personal data. We may charge you a small fee for this service.
The right to rectification - You have th: The right to rectification - You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. You also have the right to request that we complete the information you believe is incomplete.
The right to erasure - You have the righ: The right to erasure - You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions.
The right to restrict processing - You h: The right to restrict processing - You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
The right to object to processing - You: The right to object to processing - You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions.
The right to data portability - You have: The right to data portability - You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions.
If you make a request, we have one month: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.
Another part of our priority is adding p: Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.
Smartscore Global does not knowingly col: Smartscore Global does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our website, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records.
